thread.title: Guy Supercharges A Bumper Car To Drive It At Speeds Of Over 100 MPH
thread.title_full: Guy Supercharges A Bumper Car To Drive It At Speeds Of Over 100 MPH

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Guy Supercharges A Bumper Car To Drive It At Speeds Of Over 100 MPH
text:
This is the world’s fastest bumper car, as certified by Guinness World Records. It’s the brainchild of British stuntman Colin Furze . Turning it into a speed demon was a little easier than it sounds: Throwing in a gas-powered motorcycle engine and throw some rubber wheels on the bad boy. Next thing you know, the 60 CC engine is hitting a hundo in no time.
It’s a badass piece of machinery.
[H/T: Gizmodo ]
